alert.note: Alert for Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 04 at 8:48PM AKST until March 05 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow, blowing snow, rain and freezing rain occurring. Plan on difficult travel conditions with visibilities one half mile or less at times. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches are expected west of Galena, and ice accumulations of a trace are expected. * WHERE...Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys. * WHEN...Until 6 AM Saturday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting to 40 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. The heaviest snow and strongest winds are expected this evening. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning for snow and blowing snow means severe winter weather conditions are occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.

area.areaDesc: Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys
